app_descript:
Brief: Vieka is a dynamic video-editing tool designed for Android that simplifies the art of creating and editing engaging videos. With its user-friendly interface, users can merge photos and videos to music, adding stylish transition effects and filters to produce professional-level vlogs and video content.
